title: 11/16/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 11/16/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to The LA Times' Gary Klein about last night's game. What's the outlook for the Rams going in the 2nd half of the season? Dwayne Wade calls in to discuss his new memoir and shares the story of meeting Michael Jordan for the first time. And Dan Shaughnessy of The Boston Globe previews his new book about Larry Bird and the Celtics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
